alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:20AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Benton, western Washington, southeastern Delaware and central Adair Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 919 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of South West City to 3 miles east of Kansas to 4 miles southeast of Tahlequah. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Bella Vista... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Tontitown... Gravette... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Decatur... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Highfill... Watts... Springtown... Christie... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Cincinnati... Maryetta... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 85 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
